name: TinyAlert

center.description: Whether the text is centered or not

closable.description: Whether the warning can be turned off

description.description: The prompt content of the warning

icon.description: The icon of the custom warning of the incoming icon component will automatically use the corresponding icon based on the type value by default
icon.description_zh: 传入图标组件自定义警告的图标，默认会根据 type 值自动使用对应图标

show-icon.description: Whether or not to display the icon

title.description: The title of the warning, which is valid when size is large, is automatically set based on type by default
title.description_zh: 警告的标题，在 size 为 large 时有效，默认会根据 type 自动设置

events.name: close
events.description: An event that is triggered when the alert is closed
events.description_zh: 关闭 alert 时触发的事件

slots.name: close
slots.description: Custom close content, which works when the closable property is false
slots.description_zh: 自定义关闭内容，当 closable 属性为 false 时有效

slots.name: default
slots.description: The default slot of the component, which is valid when size is set to large
slots.description_zh: 组件默认插槽，当 size 设置为 large 后有效

slots.name: title
slots.description: The content of the title, which is valid when size is set to large
slots.description_zh: 标题的内容，当 size 设置为 large 后有效

description: Alert 警告，非浮层的静态展现形式，始终展现，不会自动消失，用户可以点击关闭。
description_zh: Alert 警告，非浮层的静态展现形式，始终展现，不会自动消失，用户可以点击关闭。
